OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord participate center cheek treat ( right v leave ) . Patients randomize 1 2 schedule light-emitting diode ( LED ) therapy . - Arm I : Patients undergo LED therapy 71 second daily begin day 1 myeloablative condition regimen comprise chemotherapy without radiotherapy continue 14 day bone marrow transplantation ( BMT ) . - Arm II : Patients undergo LED therapy arm I begin day BMT ( day 0 ) continue 14 day BMT . Photographs take right left buccal mucosa baseline every 3 day begin day 1 LED therapy . Pain xerostomia assess use Wong-Baker `` smiley-face '' pain scale baseline periodically 14 day BMT . Patients follow monthly 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 80 patient ( 40 per arm ) accrue study within 2 year .
